title: Anata o Aishiteyamazu
description:
A collection of stories:
1 - Kill the Bear Someday! 2 (Who are you fighting for)
(sequel to ch 1 in Itsuka wa Kuma Goroshi!!)
2 - I'm Still Quitting This Job!
(sequel to ch 4 in Itsuka wa Kuma Goroshi!!)
3 - Perfect Manager Kazuma VS Student Union Chairman Kotaro
4 - LOVE BODY delivery!
5 - What Happened at the Summer Retreat
6- You are Loved Earnestly
